entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:58 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain this morning then to snow and local blowing snow this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 late this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
